definition: lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to lie down
to eat/food/animal feed/eclipse
to feed (a person or animal)
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An

sentences.english: She couldn’t eat or sleep that night and prayed to God to help her.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上寢食難安並且祈禱上帝幫助她。

sentences.english: My house is quiet, but I forget to eat (food is tasteless). I forget to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我的房子周圍很安靜，但我總是食不知味，寢食難安。

sentences.english: Not every project has failure risks like that, things that keep you awake at night with worry.
sentences.chinese: 並非每個項目都有一些讓你寢食難安的失敗風險。

sentences.english: And I couldn't sleep over the weekend. I've been tormented.
sentences.chinese: 可整個週末，我都因此而寢食難安。

sentences.english: He says more than a decade more nights without sleep, awake at night grievances.
sentences.chinese: 他更道出十多年來夜不安眠，寢食難安的苦況。

definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
depressed/cheerless
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
examination room (in a doctor's office)
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
to shiver
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
reckless/extremely daring
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
to keep silent
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
dejected/disheartened/listless
